name: Under the Yum Yum Tree
summary_text: A love-struck landlord tries to convince a pretty tenant to dump her fiancé and give him a chance.

summary_text: The Captain of a ferry boat between the restricted British colony in Gibraltar and Spanish Morocco has a woman of differing appeal and temperament in each port.

summary_text: Global comedy star Russell Peters leaves no ethnic or cultural stereotype unstrapped in this outrageous stand-up appearance in Sydney, Australia.

summary_text: A terrified wife tries to escape from her insanely jealous husband who is bent on killing her.

name: Cat-Women of the Moon
summary_text: Astronauts travel to the moon where they discover it is inhabited by attractive young women in black tights.

name: Gangnam 1970
summary_text: Jong-Dae and Yong-Ki make a living by picking up paper and empty bottles. Both then join different gangster clan and becomes involved in a struggle of political interests over development in Gangnam, Seoul.

name: All Relative
summary_text: Things couldn't be going better for Harry and Grace, a young New York City couple in love, until Grace's mother turns Harry's world upside down.

name: Fubar: Balls to the Wall
summary_text: Terry and Dean head north to make sweet cash in the oil patch.

name: Dus Kahaniyaan
summary_text: An anthology of ten short films dealing with diverse subjects such as infidelity, companionship, lust and a spectrum of human emotions.

name: Montana
summary_text: A mob boss has the tough Claire and Nick pick up the guy, who lost money on his watch. Later, boss' Kitty runs away and Claire has to find her. Anyone not scheming? Who's shot next?

name: Nan guo zai jian, nan guo
summary_text: A glimpse at the lives of two petty criminals in Taipei.

name: Stonewall
summary_text: A group of homosexual people try to live with dignity and self-respect while events build to the opening battle in the major gay rights movement.

name: Parenti serpenti
summary_text: During the Christmas celebrations, a surprising announcement takes a family by surprise and risks to break the delicate balance that regulates the relationships between the members.

name: Which Way Is Up?

name: Jack the Ripper

name: Out of Blue

name: Sold
summary_text: A girl risks everything for freedom after being trafficked from her mountain village in Nepal to a brothel in India.

name: Namak Haraam

name: Pass Thru

summary_text: Karthikeya(Nikhil) who loves to solve mysteries goes to Subramanyapuram for a medical camp where the villagers are frightened by a deadly snake in the temple.How Karthikeya will solve the mystery is the crux of the story.

name: Ka Pae Ranasingam
summary_text: The story is about politics surrounding land and the plight of farmers. It showed Vijay helping poor farmers in their fight against the industries that have acquired their lands.

name: Everything You Want
summary_text: A visionary and artistic young woman finds her love torn between her imaginary boyfriend and a real boy from one of her classes.

name: Born Romantic
summary_text: Three young men pursue three beautiful women across London.

name: Second Skin
summary_text: A doctor and a married man's extended affair affects the lives of not only the men involved but the wife as well.

name: The Substitute 3: Winner Takes All
summary_text: At a college visit to a war buddy's professor daughter, mercenary Karl Thomasson finds her brutally beaten. He then poses as a teacher to teach a lesson, and get revenge, on the brash football jocks responsible.

summary_text: Aliens punish one of their own by sending him to earth. The alien is very violent, and when the body he occupies is damaged, he is forced to find another.

name: Captain America
summary_text: A recipient of an experimental body enhancement chemical retaliates against his would be killers as a star spangled superhero.

name: Manila in the Claws of Light
summary_text: Júlio Madiaga, a 'provinciano', arrives in Manila to search for Ligaya, his loved one.

name: Poor Cow

name: Reign of Terror
summary_text: Robespierrre, a powerful figure in the French revolution, is desperately looking for his black book, a death list of those marked for the guillotine.

summary_text: A loafer and a manicurist, both planning to marry money, meet and form an uneasy alliance.

summary_text: Based on the novel, a young gypsy becomes a Minister's obsession in 1483. Only the bell ringer and her husband and the court of miracles can save her.

name: Grandi magazzini
summary_text: A series of vignettes set in a huge shopping mall.

name: The Rounders
summary_text: In Sedona, two aging cowpokes bust broncos, charm local ladies and bet on outcomes at the rodeo.

name: Prince of Foxes
summary_text: An unscrupulous agent for the Borgias suffers a change of heart when asked to betray a noble count and his much younger, very beautiful wife.

name: The Intergalactic Adventures of Max Cloud
summary_text: A space cruiser crashes on a planet that is home to an intergalactic prison.

name: A Heavenly Christmas
summary_text: Upon her untimely death, a workaholic who never put much value into the joys of Christmas finds herself recruited to be a Christmas Angel -- and is assigned a hard luck case that she accidentally falls in love with.

summary_text: Actor/comedian David Cross skewers Donald Trump, takes shots at religious taboos and American swagger in a hilarious yet provocative night of comedy at the Paramount Theatre in Austin, TX.

name: Charming Christmas
summary_text: When a young businesswoman plays Mrs Claus at her family's department store over Christmas, her life begins to take some unexpected turns.

name: Gooische Vrouwen II
summary_text: Follows four friends who all experience struggles in their relationships and broken hearts.

name: Mensonges et trahisons et plus si affinités...

summary_text: Charlie Gordon is mentally handicapped and all he wants in life is to be a genius. Charlie takes the chance, but he must adjust emotionally when a laboratory experiment raises his IQ to amazing levels.

name: Coming Out

summary_text: Denmark four years into the future. After a major bomb attack in Copenhagen radicalization and ethnic tensions are running high, and a racist leader is leading the polls.19-year old Zakaria is afraid, wanting to do something.

name: Christmas Mail
summary_text: In this holiday romantic comedy, a mysterious woman who works at the post office answering Santa's mail captures the heart of a disillusioned postal carrier
